definition: preliminary drawing for later elaboration, describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
details:
noun
- preliminary drawing for later elaboration
= synonyms: study
- short descriptive summary (of events)
= synonyms: survey
- a humorous or satirical drawing published in a newspaper or magazine
= synonyms: cartoon
- a brief literary description
= synonyms: vignette
verb
- describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
= example: describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
= synonyms: outline, adumbrate
- make a sketch of
= example: make a sketch of
= synonyms: chalk out
